00008 #include "mecab.h"
00009 #include "nbest_generator.h"

00011 namespace MeCab {
00012 
00013 bool NBestGenerator::set(Node *node) {
00014   freelist_.free();
00015   for (; node->next; node = node->next) {}   // seek to EOS;
00016   while (!agenda_.empty()) agenda_.pop();   // make empty
00017   QueueElement *eos = freelist_.alloc();
00018   eos->node = node;
00019   eos->next = 0;
00020   eos->fx = eos->gx = 0;
00021   agenda_.push(eos);
00022   return true;
00023 }
00024 
00025 Node* NBestGenerator::next() {
00026   while (!agenda_.empty()) {
00027     QueueElement *top = agenda_.top();
00028     agenda_.pop();
00029     Node *rnode = top->node;
00030 
00031     if (rnode->stat == MECAB_BOS_NODE) {  // BOS
00032       for (QueueElement *n = top; n->next; n = n->next) {
00033         n->node->next = n->next->node;   // change next & prev
00034         n->next->node->prev = n->node;
00035         // TODO: rewrite costs;
00036       }
00037       score = top->fx;
00038       return rnode;
00039     }
00040 
00041     for (Path *path = rnode->lpath; path; path = path->lnext) {
00042       QueueElement *n = freelist_.alloc();
00043       n->node = path->lnode;
00044       n->gx = path->cost + top->gx;
00045       n->fx = path->lnode->cost + path->cost + top->gx;
00046       n->next = top;
00047       agenda_.push(n);
00048     }
00049   }
00050   score = 0;
00051   return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 long NBestGenerator::nextScore(){
00055         return score;
00056 }
